tickets.subject: Jonathan Lee - Issue/Question on VantageLens (Ref. Invoice #7 - Oct 28, 2025)
tickets.description: Subject: Issue with VantageLens Product Features Hi VantageLens Support, I’m writing from Fashion Forward about an issue we've encountered with a feature on the VantageLens platform. We're experiencing difficulties accessing the detailed analytics dashboard, as it seems the data isn't updating in real-time as expected. This has been impacting our ability to make timely business decisions. Can someone please assist us with this issue at your earliest convenience? You can reach me at jonathan.lee@fashionforward.com for further details. Thank you, Jonathan Lee
